bags.name: Gravity Zero
bags.shortDescription: Laminated Heavy Duty Jute Bag. Hand maden with Natural fibers.
bags.description: The Jute comes from stem and ribbon. After harvesting the jute plants the fibres are extracted by retting. Retting process consist of bundling jute stems together and immersing them slow running water.
